languages.text: "Нить предателя извивается, словно змея. Но теперь двое священных палачей идут по следу его. Неумирающий получит черную душу еретика для своего суда, клянусь".
"The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."
languages.original_text: "Нить предателя извивается, словно змея. Но теперь двое священных палачей идут по следу его. Неумирающий получит черную душу еретика для своего суда, клянусь".

"The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

"The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

languages.text: 「裏切り者の糸は蛇のように絡みつく。しかし今や、二人の聖なる執行者がその跡を追っている。誓って、不死の者は異端者の黒き魂を裁きのために奪うだろう」
languages.original_text: "The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

traits.locale_text: 「裏切り者の糸は蛇のように絡みつく。しかし今や、二人の聖なる執行者がその跡を追っている。誓って、不死の者は異端者の黒き魂を裁きのために奪うだろう」

languages.text: "Der Faden des Verräters windet sich wie eine Schlange. Doch nun sind ihm zwei heilige Henker auf der Spur. Der Todlose wird die schwarze Seele des Ketzers für Sein Urteil erhalten – das schwöre ich."
languages.original_text: "The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

traits.locale_text: "Der Faden des Verräters windet sich wie eine Schlange. Doch nun sind ihm zwei heilige Henker auf der Spur. Der Todlose wird die schwarze Seele des Ketzers für Sein Urteil erhalten – das schwöre ich."

languages.text: «El hilo del traidor se enrosca como una serpiente. Pero ahora tiene a dos verdugos sagrados siguiéndole el rastro. El Inmortal pronto podrá juzgar la negra alma de ese hereje... Lo juro».
languages.original_text: "The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

traits.locale_text: «El hilo del traidor se enrosca como una serpiente. Pero ahora tiene a dos verdugos sagrados siguiéndole el rastro. El Inmortal pronto podrá juzgar la negra alma de ese hereje... Lo juro».

languages.text: “那个叛徒的丝线像蛇一样盘绕，但如今，两位神圣的行刑者正在追捕他。我发誓，我一定会将那个异端分子的黑色灵魂带到不死之神面前，让祂亲自审判。”
languages.original_text: "The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

traits.locale_text: “那个叛徒的丝线像蛇一样盘绕，但如今，两位神圣的行刑者正在追捕他。我发誓，我一定会将那个异端分子的黑色灵魂带到不死之神面前，让祂亲自审判。”

languages.text: "Hainin kader ipliği bir yılan gibi kıvrılıyor. Ancak artık peşinde iki kutsal cellat var. Ant içerim ki Ölmeyen, hükmüyle o kâfirin kara ruhunu alacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

traits.locale_text: "Hainin kader ipliği bir yılan gibi kıvrılıyor. Ancak artık peşinde iki kutsal cellat var. Ant içerim ki Ölmeyen, hükmüyle o kâfirin kara ruhunu alacaktır."

languages.original_text: "The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

languages.text: « Le fil du traître s'enroule comme un serpent. Mais deux exécuteurs consacrés sont désormais sur ses traces. L'âme noire de l'hérétique sera livrée à l'Immortel pour être jugée, j'en fais le serment. »
languages.original_text: "The traitor's thread coils like a snake. But now, two sacred executioners are on his trail. The Undying One will have the heretic's black soul for His judgement — I swear it."

traits.locale_text: « Le fil du traître s'enroule comme un serpent. Mais deux exécuteurs consacrés sont désormais sur ses traces. L'âme noire de l'hérétique sera livrée à l'Immortel pour être jugée, j'en fais le serment. »
